title: About Me
subtitle: Get to know a little bit about me and my interests.
main:
Welcome to my GitHub Page! This website is meant to be a brief summary about me -- if you'd like to chat more please feel free to reach out to me via my email.

I graduated from my Master's of Engineering in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from MIT in February 2020, focusing in Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning. In recent years, my interests have been in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR), and Computational Psycholinguistics.

Some interesting facts about me:
  • My favorite authors are Dan Brown (I would highly recommend Digital Fortress or Origins) and Kurt Vonnegut (Player Piano is a must read)
  • I am bilingual, fluent in Spanish and English but want to learn German!
  • My favorite work of art is Guernica by Pablo Picasso.
